traveller.model

Class MyDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • traveller.model.MyDate

  • public class MyDate
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a date with a day, a month and a year.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Flavian Popa, Gytis Kuosaitis, Julius Jurgauskas, Mihaela Diaconescu
